rules.name: License Grant
rules.description: Ensures proper license scope and restrictions are maintained
rules.rule_text: License must be limited, non-exclusive, non-sublicensable, and non-transferable except as permitted in assignment provisions.
exceptions: Assignment section permits transfer under specific conditions

rules.name: Usage Data Rights
rules.description: Provider's right to collect and use usage data for product improvement
rules.rule_text: Provider must be permitted to collect and analyze usage data to maintain, improve, and enhance products and services. Disclosure of usage data must be limited to aggregated form that doesn't identify customer.

rules.name: Machine Learning Rights
rules.description: Rights to use data for AI/ML model development
rules.rule_text: Provider must be permitted to use aggregated and de-identified usage data to develop, train, or enhance AI/ML models with commercially reasonable efforts to de-identify data.
exceptions: Subject to applicable data protection laws

rules.name: Reverse Engineering Prohibition
rules.description: Prohibition on reverse engineering, decompiling, or discovering source code
rules.rule_text: Customer must be prohibited from reverse engineering, decompiling, or attempting to discover source code or underlying algorithms except where applicable laws prohibit this restriction.

rules.name: Resale and Distribution Prohibition
rules.description: Prohibition on reselling, sublicensing, or distributing the software
rules.rule_text: Customer must be prohibited from providing, selling, transferring, sublicensing, lending, distributing, renting, or otherwise allowing others to access or use the product.

rules.name: Derivative Works Prohibition
rules.description: Prohibition on creating derivative works or modifications
rules.rule_text: Customer must be prohibited from copying, modifying, or creating derivative works of the product.

rules.name: High Risk Activity Prohibition
rules.description: Prohibition on use in high-risk activities that could lead to death, injury, or environmental damage
rules.rule_text: Customer must be prohibited from using the product with any high risk activity where failure could lead to death, bodily injury, or environmental damage.

rules.name: Suspension Rights
rules.description: Provider's right to suspend service for breach or non-payment
rules.rule_text: Provider must have the right to temporarily suspend customer access for: (a) outstanding undisputed balance over 30 days, (b) breach of restrictions, or (c) use that materially impacts the product or others.

rules.name: Payment Terms
rules.description: Payment obligations and timing requirements
rules.rule_text: Fees must be non-refundable except for specific termination rights. Customer must pay according to agreed payment process with taxes being customer's responsibility except for provider's income taxes.
exceptions: Pro-rated refund for specific termination scenarios

rules.name: Automatic Renewal
rules.description: Automatic renewal of subscription periods
rules.rule_text: Agreement must automatically renew for additional subscription periods unless either party provides notice of non-renewal before the non-renewal notice date.

rules.name: Termination for Material Breach
rules.description: Right to terminate for material breach with cure period
rules.rule_text: Either party must be able to terminate immediately if the other party fails to cure a material breach following 30 days notice, or immediately for breaches that cannot be cured.

rules.name: Force Majeure
rules.description: Force majeure provisions for unforeseen events
rules.rule_text: Neither party should be liable for delays or failures caused by force majeure events. Either party may terminate if force majeure prevents material operation for 30+ consecutive days.
exceptions: Does not excuse payment obligations accrued prior to termination

rules.name: Warranty Disclaimer
rules.description: Disclaimer of implied warranties
rules.rule_text: All implied warranties must be disclaimed including merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, and non-infringement to the maximum extent permitted by law.

rules.name: Limitation of Liability
rules.description: Caps on liability and exclusion of consequential damages
rules.rule_text: Total liability must be capped at amounts paid in prior 12 months. Consequential, special, indirect, and punitive damages must be excluded.
exceptions: May not apply to increased claims or unlimited claims as defined

rules.name: IP Indemnification
rules.description: Provider's obligation to indemnify for IP infringement claims
rules.rule_text: Provider must indemnify customer against third-party claims that the product infringes intellectual property rights, with right to modify or replace product if needed.

rules.name: Confidentiality Obligations
rules.description: Mutual obligations to protect confidential information
rules.rule_text: Each party must protect the other's confidential information using at least reasonable standard of care and not disclose except as needed to fulfill obligations.

rules.name: Assignment Restrictions
rules.description: Restrictions on assignment of the agreement
rules.rule_text: Neither party may assign rights or obligations without prior written consent, except either party may assign upon merger, change of control, or sale of substantially all assets.
exceptions: Merger, change of control, or sale of substantially all assets

rules.name: Export Control Compliance
rules.description: Compliance with export control laws and embargo restrictions
rules.rule_text: Customer must comply with all export control laws and not be a resident/national of embargoed country or on sanctions lists. Provider may terminate to comply with export controls.

rules.name: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
rules.description: Choice of governing law and exclusive jurisdiction
rules.rule_text: Agreement must specify governing law without conflict of laws provisions and exclusive jurisdiction in chosen courts.
exceptions: Injunctive relief may be sought in any court of competent jurisdiction

rules.name: Entire Agreement
rules.description: Agreement supersedes all prior agreements and rejects additional terms
rules.rule_text: Agreement must constitute entire agreement and expressly reject any terms in customer purchase orders or vendor portals unless signed by authorized representative.

rules.name: Anti-Bribery Compliance
rules.description: Compliance with anti-bribery and anti-corruption laws
rules.rule_text: Both parties must comply with anti-bribery laws including FCPA and UK Bribery Act, prohibiting offering or receiving anything of value to obtain business.

rules.name: Updates and Maintenance
rules.description: Inclusion of updates during subscription period
rules.rule_text: Provider must provide updates and maintenance releases at no additional charge during the subscription period. Customer must install updates as soon as practicable.

rules.name: Feedback Rights
rules.description: Provider's unrestricted right to use customer feedback
rules.rule_text: Provider must have unrestricted right to use any feedback provided by customer without restriction or obligation.

rules.name: Marketing and Logo Rights
rules.description: Provider's right to identify customer in marketing materials
rules.rule_text: Provider may identify customer and use customer's name and logo in marketing to identify customer as a user of provider's products, but other announcements require approval.
exceptions: Public announcements beyond identification require prior approval

metadata.description: Compliance rules derived from standard Software License Agreement for assessing third-party contracts
